Articles.Content:
This is a sci-fi genre game where we take on the dangerous planet Venus.

Rule list:

1. Do not implement hostile alien life (what could survive IN Venus, instead of ON it?

2. Don't fight.

3. You can go to earth, just come back!

I really hope this thread actually takes off.....
I died due to heat.

I don't die, because i'm wearing a titanium and carbon nanotube suit. I am kept cool via 2 things:

Lots of insulation

A self-sustaining water-ice-water converter system that sits both inside and outside the insulation.

- - - Updated - - -

I then go to the base, and give the next poster some diet cola.

I realize I'm not dead cause I'm a Flareon.

So I put on my spacesuit for oxygen...

Then I go to the base.

And drink some beers with super.

I spit the beer out, realizing it tastes horrible. I then drink some red wine, instead.

I offer Fyre some red wine too.

I drink the wine

Then I go on EVA so I can get back to the lander cause my suit was melting.

It will return to the ship that brought us here.

I offer you to come with me.

I refuse, because i want to mine Venus. For all of that silicone that will make me extremely rich.

Do you return home, or take the chance of dying or becoming rich?

We won't be in the ship forever.

The base is also decaying.

So we need a new base.
I build a new base out of the same material as my Venus spacesuit. It will last for 4365457 years.

There is a volcano nearby.

We also need more drills.

Let's go.

Here's the lander:
OH NOES: The lander just sank into a sinkhole. Were' stuck here for a while.

You have got to be kidding me.

Our drills are worn out.

Now we can't get new drills,

Or mates... That Flareon was hot. (No pun intended)

Is It me or is that sinkhole getting bigger?

Screw this!

*Asks super If he wants to evacuate the base*
Good idea! Let's wander behind that mountain and die of exhaustion. Oh, hey there, Mr. Zangoose! You look angry....UH OH....

We're dead... And there's a freaking Zangoose is stopping us...

*Fyre Flare uses Flare Blitz*

*It wasn't very Effective*

*The wild Zangoose uses Bite*

*It wasn't Very Effective*

*Fyre Flare used Flamethrower*

*The wild Zangoose fainted*

Quick there is a nearby Lander!
Brave sprint!
The hatch is jammed!

There's the other lander! Quick Board It!

*Me and Super board the discarded Lander*

*Burns Retrograde*

*Lander Runs out of fuel*

*Docks with the ship using RCS*

We are here.... Let's stay for a while and grab some drills and mates!
There's drills, but there's no women up here. Dang.

There's not even women Flareon here... Frick... Oh well... Let's grab the drills and get to a lander.

- - - Updated - - -

OUT OF CHARACTER: We need more posters.

Not just me and super
I die because venus is a Horrible place

I die because venus is a Horrible place
We're on a ship. Chill.... Literally

I see something out the window.............

Is that a giant crab? I've gone mad.....
You've gone mad.

Ahem...

Harassment of other users or staff, this includes insulting, threatening, stalking, racism, sexism and impersonation as well as posting private conversations;

Vulgarity and profanity;

Conspiracy theories;

Links to commercial initiatives; and

Roleplaying.

Sorry guys
